Tweet 4 So why is Flamingo Finance safe? Flamingo s smart contracts are built & deployed securely on the #Neo blockchain. They do not rely on vulnerable npm packages for their core operations. This means no exposure to the compromised supply chain.

Tweet 3 Think of npm like a supermarket : Developers shop for code packages there. If a hacker poisons a product on the shelf anyone who picks it up is affected. That s a supply chain attack the risk spreads through dependencies.

Tweet 2 First what is an npm supply chain compromise? npm (Node Package Manager) is widely used by developers to install code libraries. Hackers sometimes slip malicious code into these libraries. Apps depending on them can unknowingly inherit security risks.
